name: Hashtaggery
description:
Define a new instance method called `hashtags` on the String class.

It should return an array of all alphanumeric hashtagged words in a string. A string with no hashtagged words should return an empty array.

Character case sensitivity is not important in this kata.

```ruby
"this #word is #hashtagged"
# => ["#word", "#hashtagged"]
```

A string with words with underscores or digits can still be considered a hashtag.

```ruby
"this #00word_is hashtagged"
# => ["#00word_is"]
```

A single hashtag should not be considered a hashtagged word.

```ruby
"# this #word is hashtagged"
# => ["#word"]
```

`#` are considered delimiters for words, so:

```ruby
"# these #words#are#hashtaggs"
# => ["#words","#are","#hashtaggs"]
```
